## Context.Convert.IContextDeclConvertContext interface

Context necessary to convert a [context qualifier value declaration](./ts-res.context.icontextqualifiervaluedecl.md) or [context declaration](./ts-res.context.icontextdecl.md) to their equivalent - [validated context qualifier value declaration](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextqualifiervaluedecl.md) or [validated context declaration](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)<!-- -->, respectively.

**Signature:**

